features: Superb Quality and 360 ROTATING – Every parts of the pole is made from durable, high purity aluminum, sturdy and reliable, say no to cracking, easy to grip and handle. No bend over for the extendable pole, relaxed your back from now. 360 degree rotating spray mop head, reach out every corner of your house which is hard to been seen before, like under the couch, wardrobe or bed and so on.

EXEGO Never Stop Improving - We received many advice from our customer since it start selling, we are happy to hear good side also focus on bad side, we gathered our customer’s advice, upgrade our spray mop timely to ensure you get our newest version mop. All Parts are made from top grade material for long lasting use, Innovative fully sealed water tank, say goodbye to Leaking around, reinforced responsive trigger, more sturdy and reliable. Every little improvement make us do better!

Wet & Dry Spray Mop – Features to used as both wet and dry mop, this microfiber spray mop uses the magics of microfibers to absorbed the smallest dirt and dust, and used as a wet mop to clean wooden floor, hardwood, vinyl, linoleum, cement, tile, laminate, stone and concrete floors . Dry Rubbing,wiping waxing without change equipment.

Bonus Replacement and scrubber – Our spray mop come with 4 microfiber spray mop pads, can be washable and reusable, will not cause damage for the environment, excellent water absorption with balanced friction contribute to best mopping experience. One TPR scrubber helps you to take away hairs, sewage and stubborn stains from the pads, be your good helper when you finished the mopping.

Make Cleaning Efficient And Fun – Leave the heavy messy bucket alone, refillable spray mop come with the 1 pack 440ML Water tank, you could fill it up with your favorite cleaner, just make sure clean the water tank when you finished the cleaning. Simply push the trigger on the handle, it turns water to water mist evenly, save water and make mopping efficiency with minimize efforts than the regular mop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A good value
reviews.reviewText: This mop is priced perfectly and works well! It's a wonderful option if you want a mop that doesn't require you to buy special cleaners and mop pads. The pads that come with this mop are washable and reusable. Yes I'm aware this company states it is for wood floors, but I have no problem with it on my porcelain tile along with appropriate cleaner for the tile. I dilute the cleaner. I usually use fabuloso. The pads are microfiber and scrub good to remove dirt and stains. The mop is compact. It is is easy to assemble and use. It's lightweight and sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars RED!! WONDERFUL PRODUCT!!
reviews.reviewText: After snapping three pieces together, attaching the washable mop head, adding concentrated Simple Green, and water, I made magic happen!!I REALLY enjoy not having to use batteries, nor a mop bucket, PERIOD!!For the price, I received four mop heads compared to others that give two or three.The liquid container size is fine because the spray comes out in a mist.Lovely!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My kitchen and dining room floors (wood and tile) get dirty SO often with 4 kids (age range from 1-13yrs) and a hubby who works in a dirty machine shop. I needed something I could grab quickly that wouldn't need a bucket, didn't leave a ton of water on the floor for my 1yr old to slip on, and that didn't require special refill floor pads, floor solution, or need a recharge or change of batteries. ...ENTER this little spray mop. Super easy to assemble, came with 5 washable mop heads, and seems to be sturdy enough for daily use. Plus, it meets ALL of my requirements! It even comes with this little tool that you can use to scrape those stuck on blobs or scrub a little area that may need it. It fits right onto the handle so you don't lose it! I absolitely LOVE this little bonus tool!! I tried out the mop immediately with water and a little bit of dish soap and it did exactly what I needed it to. I was impressed that I didn't need to scrub excessively at the spots like I sometimes do with some other mops. This thing is extremely convenient and works well!My biggest issue with this mop is that the handle is a bit short for me (I'm 5'7). It would be super nice to have an adjustable handle. It still works great though, and I plan to keep it in my arsenal of kitchen cleaning tools. Would definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to assemble, just snaps together in a few pieces and takes less than a minute. Tank is easy to fill and doesn't leak at all. I've washed the pads many times at this point and they're holding up great. Love that it just has a pump trigger and doesn't need batteries that constantly die.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LIFESAVER for a multicat household.
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this thing for so many reasons. First, I love that it's much more environmentally friendly with its reusable pads than the name-brand floor sprayer I'm replacing it with which uses single-use pads covered in detergent. I have three adult cats and now three kittens in my apartment. That means a lot of litter LOL no way around it, and because they all eat wet food and eat like precious little psychos, my floors are just... perpetually horrifying. Litter dust and dried food and a carrot they stole from someone's dinner plate and pieces of catnip from two months ago that appear anyway, plus hairballs and who knows what else. Do you want a cat yet? Anyway, this is wonderful, and the texture of the microfiber REALLY cleans all of my floors so well (I have linoleum in the kitchen, wood throughout the main rooms, and tile in the bathroom - works great on all three). Highly recommend!!

reviews.reviewText: I bought due to cost, but after assembly and use, it was defective and of poor quality it leaked

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This mop works just as expected. I've tried a few mops of different types and can't seem to find one I want to use consistently. This is pretty good, and I can see myself using it for a while, so that's saying something.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These was a must for our house as we have dogs and this was perfect for quickly cleaning up dog prints etc. But after only a few months the trigger on the handle broke so its not useable now

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent for the cleaning it is designed for and did well on an impossible challenge.
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble - built and ready for use in 2 minutes. I like the way the pads just attach with downward force rather than needing straps or handling when replacing a dirty pad. Despite this, the pads stay there until you pull them off. Pads are easier to fit than for some well known brands.Instructions say just add water to the bottle, but advert had said "use with preferred cleaner", so I added the first cream cleaner I found under the sink and in a flash, started to clean a laminate floor where we had just removed some furniture. I swept first to avoid fluff clogging the cleaning pad - maybe your home is cleaner and will not need to do that. The spay works well and reduces the amount of water on the laminate floor.Very happy with results, so moved onto two different tiled floors, one with a shiny surface and one with a textured finish - it performed well and made both look much better, but I did need additional effort on the textured finished.Results were good, so moved onto a real challenge - an anti-static floor protector in the office that has been down for 3 years and never been washed before. On the upper surface it performed excellently and there was a definite improvement, although one stubborn mark required me to remove the stiff brush, supplied and attached to the hands of the cleaner to remove the mark. It was unable to remove all the marks from the "grippy" under side of the floor protector, but it did remove all but the most stubborn marks. I know that this requires a hard scrubbing brush and a specialist cleaning spray, so delighted that it removed much of the mess.No reason not to give this 5 stars - it was surprisingly effective and easy to use!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the EXEGO Microfibre Spray Mops for Floor Cleaning and have found them to be quite efficient. The compact and lightweight design makes it easy to clean under furniture and in corners, which is a big plus. The inclusion of four reusable washable pads is also a great feature, reducing waste and saving money in the long run. However, for larger areas, it can be a bit time-consuming as you need to refill the spray bottle frequently. Overall, it's a handy tool for everyday cleaning, especially in smaller spaces, but may require more effort for extensive use in larger homes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: When it arrives the mop requires a small amount of assembly, which is easy for anyone to to do. The mop is simple to fill and operate. I like how lightweight it is. I am very pleased that four reusable cleaning pads are included so there is always one available to use. The pads can be machine washed. No negatives. Good value for money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice and light weight. Easy to assemble and holds a decent amount of liquid. Easy to use and spray works well. Comes with a scraper attachment as well.
